column6: Hira Naveed has done her Bachelors and Masters in computer science from university of central Punjab. She has gained experience as a teacher assistant in a leading university of Pakistan for 6 months, she also worked as SQA engineer at blue orca studio (software house), and done several projects with blue orca studio. She is currently teaching Lab object oriented Programming courses of software engineering in Faculty of Information Technology.

column6: Mr. Muhammad Noman has 3 years of professional career as AI Engineer, Teacher Assistant, Research Assistant. He completed his MSCS from Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS) and BSCS from Government College University (GCU) Lahore. He has been industrial, teaching and working as a research assistant at the oldest and one of the most well-known institution in Pakistan. His research interests include Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Natural Language Processing and Data Mining.

column6: Haroon Abdul Waheed is an Assistant Professor in the Faculty of IT at UCP. He teaches Software Engineering and Programming courses, supervises final-year projects, develops mobile apps, and advises students. He did BS in Computer Science from UCP, MS in CS from LUMS (2005), and MSc Advanced Methods from Queen Mary University of London (2008). He is currently pursuing research in machine learning.

column6: Dr. Gulshan Saleem, a Ph.D. in Computer Science from COMSATS University Islamabad, Pakistan, specializes in anomaly detection and video analytics. With over 15 peer-reviewed publications, 400+ Google Scholar citations, and a cumulative impact factor exceeding 15, she holds 6 years’ experience and recognized expert in machine learning, data science, and AI. Currently serving as an Assistant Professor at the University of Central Punjab, she has extensive experience in teaching, research supervision, including organizing major events and leading strategic committees. Previously, she supervised multiple projects, authored grant-winning proposals, and managed institutional collaborations. Dr. Gulshan’s expertise spans data analysis, deep learning, information retrieval and AI frameworks, complemented by her role as a professional trainer. She is dedicated to advancing research, fostering student success, and bridging academia with industry.

column6: Dr. Nauman Mazher is an Associate Professor and HoD Software Engineering at the Faculty of IT, UCP. He completed his MS from Iowa State University, USA, and PhD from CASE, UET Taxila. He previously served as Wing Commander in the Pakistan Air Force and has extensive teaching and administrative experience. His research interests include IoT networks, wireless systems, and energy-efficient MANET security.
